# ImageHashObject

**Type**

An object that defines a set of images URLs for different scales.

## Declaration

```swift
type ImageHashObject = {
    [ratio: string]: string | undefined;
} & {};
```

## Discussion

The framework automatically loads the appropriate image for the device’s screen scale. Use [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/ImageDelegate] to provide custom URLs for different scales.

## Setting images

- **ImageDelegate**: An object you use to specify image URLs.
